オカルトに傾倒し、ＵＦＯや心霊現象などを信じているマニアックな女の子。お母さんのような包容力があり、つい甘えたくなるぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
超自然从者
沉迷于超自然主义，相信UFO和灵异现象的狂热女孩。也有像妈妈一样的包容力，不知不觉就想对她撒娇了。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Occult-Type Servant

A fangirl of the occult, UFOs and the supernatural. Her unconditional acceptance of those around her makes people open up to her.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
じょおうサーヴァント
ムチをふりまわしたり平手打ちしたりする、ごく一般的な女王様。移動式マイルームを乗り回し、いろんなものを連れ込むライダーの鑑。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
女王从者
挥舞鞭子或者掌掴，是非常普通的女王大人。乘坐移动式单间四处兜风，也携带着各种各样的东西，是骑兵之鉴。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Queen-Type Servant

Just a normal queen who twirls her whip around and slaps anyone in her way, like any other queen would. She travels in a mobile My Room, bringing all manner of things and people into it with her. She is a true Rider in every sense of the word.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
わるわるサーヴァント
全身を鋭い棘に覆われているため、丸まって転がるだけで相手にダメージを与えることができるぞ。また、眠っているときもこの棘で自分の身を守っているため、奇襲も通用しない。バーサーカーなのに頭が良い。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
坏坏从者
因为全身被尖锐的刺所覆盖，所以只需蜷起来滚动过去就可以给对方造成伤害。另外，睡觉的时候也会用刺保护自己，所以奇袭也没有用。虽然是Berserker但是很聪明。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bad-Type Servant

Since he's covered in thorns, you can just roll him at enemies to damage them, just like a certain hedgehog. Not only that, but the thorns also protect him from ambushes while he sleeps! Pretty clever for a Berserker.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
かんごしサーヴァント
みんな知ってる看護師さんの代名詞的存在。病や怪我を根絶するためには患者を殺すことも辞さない過激な治療を行うぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
护士从者
正如大家所知的那样，她是如同护士的代名词一般的存在。为了根除疾病与创伤，她会进行即使将患者杀死也在所不惜的过激治疗。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Nurse-Type Servant

The most well-known nurse in the world. She will use any means necessary to treat her patient, even if that treatment kills them.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
クハハサーヴァント
いつもマスターのことを見守っている謎のサーヴァント。呼び方を間違えるとけっこう怒るが、落ち着いて話を聞いていればやがて鎮まるはず。得意技は暗黒光線。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
呵哈哈从者
一直守护着御主的谜之从者。如果弄错了对他的称呼的话他会很生气，但冷静下来听的话，应该很快就会平息下来。拿手好戏是暗黑光线。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Kuhaha-Type Servant

A mysterious Servant who's always watching over his Master from the shadows. He gets pretty mad if you call him by the wrong name, but if you listen to his story, he'll calm down eventually. His special attack is the Dark Beam.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ショタサーヴァント
ギルガメッシュの幼少時代。大人ギルと違ってかわいらしく性格もいい子だが、成長したらああなるんだろうなーと思わせる片鱗も見える。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
正太从者
幼年时期的吉尔伽美什。和成年吉尔不同，是个既可爱性格又好的孩子，不过也能窥见一些让人觉得他长大后还是会变成那样的细节。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Shota-Type Servant

Gilgamesh when he was just a boy. Unlike the adult Gil, Kid Gil is a good boy with an adorable personality. Every once in a while, though, you'll catch a side of him that reminds you he's still the same Gil.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
おとこのこサーヴァント
ついててもついてなくてもアストルフォちゃんはかわいいけれど、アストルフォちゃんが女の子なわけがないだろ！！
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
伪娘从者
虽然不管长着还是没长着阿斯托尔福亲就是很可爱，但是阿斯托尔福亲不可能是女孩子！！
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Cute Boy?-Type Servant

Gender means nothing in the face of Astolfo's cuteness! But there's really no way Astolfo could be a girl!

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
うさんくさいサーヴァント
コイツがイベントに登場するときは、ほぼ確実に何かを企んでいるとき。コイツがメインに登場するときは、間違いなく何かを企んでいるとき。企まないと生きていけないサーヴァントだが、最終的には善行に繋がるので、そこそこ見逃されている。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
可疑的从者
这家伙在活动中登场的时候，基本确定就是有什么图谋的时候。这家伙在主线中登场的时候，基本确定就是有什么图谋的时候。不图谋着什么就无法生存的从者，但是因为最终关系到善行，所以还是睁一只眼闭一只眼了。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Shady-Type Servant

If he shows up in an event, he's probably planning something shady. If he shows up in the main story, he's DEFINITELY planning something shady. He cannot survive without making shady plans, but in the end it all kind of works out for the best, so people tend to let him off the hook.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
うさぎサーヴァント
夜の街を散歩する都市伝説。ぴょんぴょん跳ねるのが得意。月面宙返りもするぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
兔子从者
在夜晚的街道散步的都市传说。很擅长蹦蹦跳跳地行动。甚至能使出月面宙返。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bunny-Type Servant

An urban legend who walks the streets at night. She likes hopping around like a bunny. She can even do a moonsault.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
うさぎサーヴァント
雪の夜にあらわれる都市伝説。鍛えているのではだしでも寒くない。その長ドスはたいていのものを即死させる。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
兔子从者
在雪之夜出现的都市传说。因为经过锻炼的缘故就算光着脚也不会感到寒冷。那把长刀会使得大部分东西即死。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bunny-Type Servant

An urban legend who appears on a snowy night. She works out, so the cold doesn't bother her even when she's barefoot. That long sword of hers can kill anything.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
こうていサーヴァント
お嫁さんになったネロ。しあわせいっぱいのオーラにマスターもニッコリ。ブーケをみんなに振る舞うので周りもニッコリ。誰だろうとお嫁さんには敵わないのだ。ドヤッ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
皇帝从者
成为新娘的尼禄。这充满幸福的氛围让御主也笑了起来。把捧花抛给大家，周围的人也都露出了笑容。不管是谁都敌不过新娘呢。厉害吧！
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Emperor-Type Servant

The Nero who became a bride. The aura of happiness surrounding her can bring a smile to her Master's face, and there are enough bouquets to go around to make sure everyone's smiling. No matter who it is, you just can't beat the power of a bride waifu. How about that?

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
すてごろサーヴァント
武器を持ってはいるが、最終的には拳でやった方が手っ取り早いと武器を捨ててしまう。その武器はエミヤが美味しく頂いてるぞ。エコい。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
徒手攻击从者
原本是持有武器的，但若是最终还是觉得用拳头更省事，他就会丢掉武器。那个武器由卫宫好好地收下了。很环保。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bare-Knuckle-Type Servant

He does have a weapon, but at the end of the day it's faster to just punch someone's face in, so he always tosses his sword away. Don't worry, EMIYA will recycle it. How ecological.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
こまりますサーヴァント
美しきワルキューレの一種。いつも何かに困っていて、いつも誰かのことを探している。幻のサーヴァントであるシグルドを探しているという噂があるが……
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
困扰从者
她是美丽的瓦尔基里的一种。她一直在困扰着什么，一直在找寻着谁。有传言说她一直在找寻幻之从者齐格鲁德......
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Troubled-Type Servant

One of the beautiful Valkyries. Seems something is always troubling her, and she is always looking for someone. Rumor has it that she's been searching for the Mythical Servant Sigurd...

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
びだんしサーヴァント
部下と一緒に山でイノシシ狩りをするのが得意で、駄洒落と鮭が大好き。愛用の槍からはびっくりするほど水が出てくるぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
美男子从者
擅长和部下一起在山上打猎野猪，非常喜欢冷笑话和鲑鱼。爱用的枪居然会喷出水来，令人吃惊。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Handsome-Type Servant

He likes boar hunting with his subordinates, dad jokes, and salmon. You'll be surprised how much water can pour out of his spear.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
アルトリアサーヴァント
数あるサーヴァントの中でも最も元ネタが分からない。アルトリア種を根絶やしにするためにアルトリア遺伝子から作られた哀しき殺戮兵器。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
阿尔托莉雅从者
在众多从者中最不知道原型为何。为了根绝阿尔托莉雅种，由阿尔托莉雅基因制造的可悲的杀戮兵器。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Artoria-Type Servant

Of all the Servants to exist, her origin is the most mysterious. She's a mass-murdering weapon created from Artoria genes to eradicate all the Artoria-type Servants.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
びだんしサーヴァント
見た目はビジュアル系の怖いお兄さんだがものごしがとても低い。誰とでも仲良くできるのが最大の武器。でもアルジュナとは犬猿の仲。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
美男子从者
外表看起来是视觉系的可怕哥哥，但却为人谦逊。和谁都能友好相处是最大的武器。但是和阿周那是水火不容的关系。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Handsome-Type Servant

He looks like he could be in a visual kei band, but he's actually quite humble in nature. His greatest weapon is that he can be friends with just about any one, except for Arjuna.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
まはーばーらたサーヴァント
ライバルのカルナとそこら中で争っている。カルナがたけのこなら、アルジュナはきのこ、カルナがこしあんなら、アルジュナはつぶあんを選ぶので、土産物を渡すときに楽。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
摩诃婆罗多从者
与对手的迦尔纳不断地斗争。倘若迦尔纳选竹笋的话，阿周那就选蘑菇；如果说迦尔纳选粗馅的话，阿周那就会选细馅，送礼的时候很轻松。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Mahābhārata-Type Servant

Will fight with Karna about almost anything. If Karna chooses red wine, he will pick white wine. If Karna chooses rice, he will go with pasta. At least they never fight over who gets what gift.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
モンスターサーヴァント
電気で動くモンスター。センサーが内蔵されていて、ナデナデしたりすると喜ぶ。成長すればいろんな言葉をしゃべりだすぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
怪物从者
靠电力驱动的怪物。因为有内置传感器，被摸摸头就会很高兴。成长起来就能开始说各种各样的话了。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Monster-Type Servant

A monster powered by electricity. She has various types of sensors embedded inside of her. Gets very excited if you pat her on her head. Her vocabulary expands as she levels.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
うろんサーヴァント
正義の味方になりたかった、気の弱いサーヴァント。いつも苦悩にあふれている。あばれサーヴァントで召喚された時の方が安定している。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
可疑从者
想成为正义的伙伴的懦弱从者。总是满心苦恼。作为狂暴从者被召唤时倒是比较安定。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Suspicious-Type Servant

He wished to become a hero of justice, but his timid nature means he worries quite a lot. His mind is actually more stable when he's summoned as a Berserk-type Servant.

Suspicious-Type Servant

He wished to become a hero of justice, but his timid nature means he worries quite a lot. His mind is actually more stable when he's summoned as a Berserk-type Servant.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
メタルサーヴァント
どうみてもロボなサーヴァント。６万５０００馬力のメカニカルでロボなアーマーを着込んでいる。鎧の中を覗いた人はまだ誰もいない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
金属从者
怎么看都像是机器人的从者。装有6万5000马力的机械装甲。还没有任何人窥见过铠甲里面。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Metal-Type Servant

No matter how you slice it, this Servant looks like a robot. He wears locomotive armor that outputs 65,000 horsepower. To this day, no one has seen what he looks like under all that armor.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ともだちサーヴァント
寂しがりのサーヴァント。放っておくとホムンクルスをどんどん作り始めてしまうので注意しよう。友達が少ない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
朋友从者
很怕寂寞的从者。如果置之不理的话就会开始不断地制造人工生命体，千万要注意。朋友很少。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Friend-Type Servant

A Servant who's afraid of being alone. If you do happen to leave him alone for too long, he'll start endlessly producing homunculi, so be careful. He actually doesn't have that many friends.

79.mcLink: 冯·霍恩海姆·帕拉塞尔苏斯

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
アルトリアサーヴァント
槍を持って馬に乗って王様にふさわしい貫禄を得たアルトリアオルタ。見た目は大人に成長したが性格は相変わらず凶暴なままだぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
阿尔托莉雅系从者
拿着枪、骑着马，得到了与国王大人相称威严的阿尔托莉雅Alter。虽然外表长成了大人的样子，但是性格还是很凶暴呢。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Artoria-Type Servant

The Artoria Alter who wields a lance and gets to sit on a horse like a king. She has a more...mature body, but she's as violent as ever.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
でんきサーヴァント
誰もが科学館などで一度は目にしたことのあるかっこいいプラズマボールを発明したことで有名なおじさん。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
电气从者
就是那个因为发明了无论是谁都有在科学馆这类地方见过的超帅气等离子球而出名的大叔。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Electric-Type Servant

The famous guy who invented that cool-looking plasma globe, which anyone who ever visited a science museum has seen at least once.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
えんたくサーヴァント
大体十五くらいの夜に反抗期をむかえ、夜のキャメロットの窓ガラスを壊して回った世代。盗んだプリドゥエンで走り出すが、アーサー王の悪口を言われると激おこする、ちょっと扱いにくいサーヴァント。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
圆桌从者
大约处在于十五岁左右的晚上迎来逆反期，大晚上打碎了卡美洛城窗玻璃的年纪。驾着偷走的普利多温到处乱跑，不过一听到有人说亚瑟王的坏话就会十分愤怒，是个有些不好相处的从者。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Round Table-Type Servant

On the night of their fifteenth birthday, Mordred decided to be rebellious and started breaking windows and knocking down mailboxes. This Servant loves to run around with the Prydwen stolen from King Arthur, but will get mad if anyone badmouths Arthur. Kinda difficult to deal with.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ようじょサーヴァント
露出狂な亡霊サーヴァント。隙あらば、マスターでも誰でも解体しようとするが、もちろんこれは他愛のない冗談でもなんでもない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
幼女从者
有暴露癖的亡灵从者。瞅准空子就想把御主或者随便任何人给解体了，当然这可不是在开玩笑啊。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Girl-Type Servant

A ghost who might maybe not wear quite enough. She has a burning desire to dismember anyone who lets their guard down, even her own Master. No joke.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
えほんサーヴァント
かわいい。それ以外になにか説明がいるのだろうか。最近は日本の文化に興味津々。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
绘本从者
可爱。除此之外没有什么可以说明的了。最近对日本的文化很感兴趣。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Picture Book-Type Servant

She's completely adorable. Nothing else need be said. Really curious about Japanese culture lately, though.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
アルトリアサーヴァント
サンタ化したアルトリアオルタ。相変わらず凶暴で、プレゼント袋でどついてきたりマスターをトナカイ呼ばわりしソリを引かせたりする。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
阿尔托莉雅从者
圣诞化的阿尔托莉雅Alter。她还是一如既往的粗暴，用礼物袋揍人，称呼御主为驯鹿并让御主拉着雪橇到处跑。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Artoria-Type Servant

The Artoria Alter who turned into a Santa. She retains her violent nature. Likes to swing her present bag around as a weapon, call her Master a reindeer, and make them pull the sleigh.

73.mcLink: 阿尔托莉雅·潘德拉贡〔圣诞Alter〕

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ぜつりんサーヴァント
クー・フーリンから叔父貴と呼ばれているナイスガイ。常にパワフル。困った時にも困っていない時にも頼りになるぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
精力绝伦从者
被库·丘林称呼为叔父大人的好男人。总是精力充沛。无论有没有遇到困难都可以依靠他。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Thirsty-Type Servant

A nice guy whom Cú Chulainn refers to as "uncle." His powerful body and skills make him reliable in any and all situations.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
びだんしサーヴァント
流し目とホクロのエロさだけでやっていけるのに、宝具も地味に強いよくできたサーヴァント。なのに恵まれないのは上司運がないからか。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
美男子从者
明明光是用色气的眼神和泪痣就能搞定了，但宝具也普通地很强，他就是这样一位强力从者。但却这么不幸是因为没有运气遇上好上司吗？
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Handsome-Type Servant

His alluring eyes and beauty mark are enough to make any Master want him, yet he even has a powerful Noble Phantasm to make him an even better Servant. However, this man who seems to have it all has the worst luck in bosses.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
タイツサーヴァント
全身タイツのエッチなお姉さん。クー・フーリンの師匠として知られており、マスターのことも色々と鍛えてくれる。年齢を尋ねてはいけない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
紧身衣从者
全身紧身衣的色气满满的大姐姐。她作为库·丘林的老师而为世人所知，而她也会对御主进行各种各样的锻炼。千万不要试图探寻她的年龄。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bodysuit-Type Servant

An attractive lady wearing a skintight bodysuit. Known as Cú Chulainn's mentor, she will train her Master as well. Don't ask about her age if you want to live.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
まおうサーヴァント
せんごく時代のあつもりダンサー。つごうが悪いことがおきるとかわいい声に変えてごまかす。ほんたいは変な帽子のほうともいわれている。ま、ぜひもないよネ！
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
魔王从者
战国时代的敦盛舞者。一旦发生不好的事情，就改用可爱的声音糊弄过去。也有人说那顶奇怪的帽子才是本体。哎呀，那也是无可奈何呢！
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Demon King-Type Servant

The Atsumori dancer who lived during the Warring States Period of Japan. When things are turning against her, she'll change her voice to sound cute and get out of trouble. It's rumored that her hat is her true body. Well, it can't be helped!

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ひときりサーヴァント
かわいい顔できんのう志士を斬りまくるとけつタイプのひときりサーヴァント。バクマツ地方では最強格のサーヴァントだが、かんじんな時にやくにたたない。そんなー。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
人斩从者
是个用可爱的脸斩杀无数勤王志士的吐血型人斩从者。虽然在幕末地区是堪称最强水准的从者，关键的时候却派不上用场。怎么这样啊~。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Murderer-Type Servant

A murderer-type Servant with a cute face, but who mows down imperialists like grass. She's the most powerful Servant of the Bakumatsu Region, but she always screws up at the most crucial moment. Nooo!

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ゆめみがちサーヴァント
素敵な王子様と出会うことを、いつでも夢見ていたぞ。残念なことに、出会った王子様は少々ダメ人間だったが、そこは気にしてはいけない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
爱做梦从者
总是梦想着和一位漂亮的王子邂逅。不幸的是，她遇上的王子是个有点差劲的家伙，不过可不能在意这个。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Dreaming-Type Servant

She dreams of one day meeting her Prince Charming. Sadly, her prince wasn't at all charming. He was actually a bit of a dirtbag. Ah, well. Don't dwell on it too much.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
かいぞくサーヴァント
仲良しすぎてふたりセットで召喚された百合海賊コンビ。体力が減るほど宝具威力が強くなる変態的な体質の持ち主。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
海盗从者
因关系过好而被成对召唤的百合海盗组合。拥有体力越少宝具威力越强的变态体质。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Pirate-Type Servant

These yuri pirates are such close BFFs that they get summoned together. They deal more damage with their Noble Phantasm when their HP is low. What masochists.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
かいぞくサーヴァント
黄金鹿号の船長。マスターにお金を要求するが、その倍以上のお宝をＧＥＴしてくる有能なあねご。だがその倍の打ち上げ費用を要求するため、儲けはいつもトントン。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
海盗从者
黄金鹿号的船长。虽然管御主要钱，但却能GET到多一倍的宝贝的能人大姐头。但是由于填补同样成倍的庆功宴需求，利润总处于收支平衡。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Pirate-Type Servant

Captain of the Golden Hind. She demands money from her Master, but will return with treasure far more valuable. She's quite competent in that aspect, but then she demands twice as much money to throw an after party. It's really not a lucrative business.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
おじさんサーヴァント
ダンディな魅力溢れる、中間管理職おじさんだ。右肘にジェットが仕込んでいるが、そのせいか最近、腱鞘炎の診断を下された。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
大叔从者
浑身散发着时髦魅力的中层管理者大叔。右肘中装填着喷射器，但因此最近被诊断为腱鞘炎。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Old Man-Type Servant

An attractive dandy and the middle management type. After putting a jet in his right elbow, he was diagnosed with tenosynovitis.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
かなりやるサーヴァント
分類は自己申告によるものらしい。立派な王様のはずなのに、アビシャグアビシャグうるさい。おじいちゃん、もうお嫁さんはもらったでしょ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
相当能干的从者
分类似乎是根据他自己说的话申报的。明明是位杰出的王者，却亚比煞亚比煞地吵个不停。爷爷，你已经娶媳妇了吧。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Screw Around-Type Servant

Apparently, he chose this category. He's a great king, but he just won't shut up about Abishag. Grandpa, you already have a wife, remember?

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
たまもサーヴァント
良き妻になるために努力を重ねているという伝説のサーヴァント。しかしそんなコトより男を手玉にとるコトの方がうまい。狐耳はそんな世の中のむつかしさを表しているという。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
玉藻从者
为了成为贤妻而不断努力中的传说从者。只不过比起这个，还是更擅长把男人玩弄于股掌之上。据说狐耳表达着身处于那种世界中的艰辛。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Tamamo-Type Servant

A legendary Servant who puts all her effort into trying to be a good wife. But in all honesty, she's better at teasing and manipulating men. Her fox ears are the physical representation of that harsh reality.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
かぼちゃサ一ヴァント
ハロウィンの仮装に身を包んだかわいい魔女っ子エリザベート。それにしてもエリちゃんって何を着ても似合うしほんとかわいいよね…かわいい。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
南瓜从者
用万圣节服饰装扮自己的可爱小魔女伊丽莎白。话说回来，伊丽亲不管穿什么都很适合，真的很可爱呢…好可爱。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Pumpkin-Type Servant

Teenage witch Elizabeth dressed in her Halloween costume. People probably already know this, but Elizabeth really looks good in anything... She's so cute...

61.mcLink: 伊丽莎白·巴托里〔万圣节〕

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
くまくまサーヴァント
スケベなくま、オリべえだ。マスコットのアルテミスは、とってもかわいいが基本的にダーリンに対しては殺意全開だぞ。そこがかわいいんだけど。モーションがリニューアルされ、ダーリンはよくブン投げられるようになった。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
熊熊从者
色鬼熊，俄里翁。尽管身为吉祥物的阿耳忒弥斯很可爱，但基本上对亲爱的是杀气全开的。虽然这一点也很可爱就是了。随着动作模组的更新，亲爱的经常会被抛出去。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bear-Type Servant

A perverted bear, Oribear. The bonus mascot Artemis is very cute, but her murderous intent for her darling is unending. Apparently, it is what makes her cute. After the animation update, Artemis throws her darling more in battle.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
せいじょサーヴァント
神の電波を受信してしまったためについついはりきってしまったあげくひどい目にあった哀しき聖乙女。ちゃんと役に立つ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
圣女从者
因为能收到神的电波而不知不觉就干劲十足、最终迎来悲惨结局的可悲的圣处女。很是可靠。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Holy Maiden-Type Servant

A holy maiden who worked too hard because of a message she received from God and met a pitiful end. She can be quite useful.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
たまもサーヴァント
あらぶるネコの波動に目覚めたネコ。玉藻の前から分かれた分身みたいなものらしいが、玉藻の前より純真で家事能力が高いぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
玉藻从者
觉醒了暴走猫之波动的猫。虽然说像是玉藻前分离出的分身之类的，却比玉藻前还要纯洁且家务能力更高。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Tamamo-Type Servant

A cat awakened to the overflowing feline energy within. She seems to have split off from Tamamo no Mae, but she is much purer and better at housework than Tamamo no Mae.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
きょうさいかサーヴァント
奥さんのグンヒルドが、ちょくちょくと伝言を残していくのが、少しだけホラーだぞ。実は喋れるのだが、奥さんが怖いのであまり喋ってくれない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
妻管严从者
他的妻子贡希尔达时常会留下一些口信，只是内容稍微有点恐怖。其实是可以正常说话的，因为很害怕老婆所以才不太说。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Wife-Fearing-Type Servant

His wife Gunnhild leaves him messages from time to time. It sounds sweet, but it's more like something out of a horror movie. He actually can talk, but he seldom does so, such is his fear of his wife.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
へびサーヴァント
愛が重すぎて大蛇になってしまった少女。必要以上にマスターに懐いてくるが、彼女を欺いた者は容赦なく蒸し殺されるぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
蛇从者
因爱太过沉重而变成大蛇的少女。过于亲近御主，不过欺骗她的人会被毫不留情地烧死。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Snake-Type Servant

Her love is so burdensome it turned her into a snake. She warms to her Master a little more than she should, but prepare to be burned to death if you dare lie to her.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
あばれサーヴァント
とても大きな肉体を持っているぞ。あばれサーヴァントとしては比較的温厚な性格だが、イスカンダルを見ると暴走してしまう。実はお金持ち。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
狂暴从者
有着硕大的身躯。在狂暴从者中性格算是比较温厚，不过一旦看到伊斯坎达尔就会暴走。其实很有钱。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Berserk-Type Servant

His body is ginormous. Among the Berserk-type Servant, he is quite tame, but he will go nuts whenever he sees Iskandar. Also very rich.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
こうていサーヴァント
いつも吠えているので意思疎通が難しい、あばれ皇帝。ネロのことが好き。体を動かすのも好きで、読書も好き。満月の夜に餌をあげると手が付けられなくなる。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
皇帝从者
因为经常在吼叫导致沟通困难，凶暴的皇帝。喜欢尼禄。喜欢活动身体，也喜欢读书。在满月之夜给他饵料的话会很棘手。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Emperor-Type Servant

This emperor is crazy and constantly yelling, so it's hard to understand what he's saying. He loves exercise, reading, and more than anything, Nero. If you feed him under the full moon he'll get even more out of control.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
うしくんサーヴァント
暗くて複雑なところに引き籠もろうとする大人しいサーヴァント。全体的にもふもふとしているため、ブラッシングは欠かさないように。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
小牛从者
因为一些黑暗又复杂的原因而决定自己把自己关起来的老实从者。因为浑身都是毛茸茸的，所以请务必不要忘记梳毛。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bull-Type Servant

He's a quiet Servant who tends to shut himself away in dark, complicated places. His fur is pretty fluffy, so make sure to brush him regularly.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
きゅうけつきサーヴァント
本人は吸血鬼ではないと言っているが、好みの血液型はＡＢ型だ。お裁縫が趣味で、よく子供サーヴァントやマスターのために、編み物を作ってくれるぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
吸血鬼从者
本人强调自己不是吸血鬼，但喜欢的血型是AB型。他对手工活很感兴趣，经常为小孩子从者和御主缝新衣服。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Vampire-Type Servant

Claims he's not a vampire, but his favorite blood type is AB. Sewing and needlework are his hobbies, and he often knits sweaters and gloves for his Master and the Servant children.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ゴールデンサーヴァント
電撃を自由自在にあやつる、とても力持ちなグラサン。ゴールデンなものと子供が好きで悪い奴が大嫌いな、主人公属性の持ち主。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
黄金从者
自如地操纵电击，身强力壮的墨镜男。喜欢金色的东西和小孩子，最讨厌坏人，是个拥有主角属性的人。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Golden-Type Servant

He wears a pair of sunglasses and can control lightning. Loves all things gold, adores children, and hates everything evil. Might actually be more protagonist than the protagonist.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
はんぎゃくしゃサーヴァント
いつも顔色が悪いが、実はゾンビではない。いつも笑っているが、実は愉快になっている訳ではない。油断するとがじがじと噛みついてくるぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
反叛者从者
虽说脸色一直很糟糕，但他其实并不是僵尸。虽说一直在笑，但其实这并不意味着他很愉快。一不留神可是会被他咔叽咔叽地吞噬哦。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Rebellion-Type Servant

He looks sick, but rest assured, he's not a zombie. He laughs a great deal, but isn't really happy. If you let your guard down, he'll come back and bite you in the ass. Figuratively.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
あばれサーヴァント
一切の無駄のないモーションに高い知性を感じる悲しいバーサーカー。そのつぶらな瞳は何を見ているのだろう……
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
狂暴从者
从那毫不拖泥带水的动作模组可以看出智力很高的可悲的Berserker。那双圆圆的眼睛究竟在看着什么呢……
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Berserk-Type Servant

A sad Berserker with clean animation and a sense of intelligence. What is the object of his beautiful gaze?

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
あばれサーヴァント
黒光りする甲冑と、闇に光る眼光がどう見てもロボだがロボではない。だが壊れやすいのでやはりロボなのかもしれない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
狂暴从者
黑亮的铠甲加上黑暗中发光的眼睛，无论怎么看都像是机器人却又不是机器人。不过因为容易被破坏，说不定可能真的是机器人之类的吧。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Berserk-Type Servant

Clad in black armor and sporting red, glow-in-the-dark eyes, you'd think he came out of some robot anime. But he's not a robot. Still, he breaks down really easily... Maybe he IS a robot…

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
あばれサーヴァント
岩のごときボディに沸騰したヤカンのごときブレイン。振るう剣は神殿の柱。こんなの弱いはずがない。十二の試練はズルすぎるので封印した。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
狂暴从者
岩石般的身体与宛如沸腾的水壶一般的头脑。挥舞的剑是神殿的柱子。这怎么可能会弱啊。十二试炼因为太犯规了所以被封印了。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Berserk-Type Servant

With a body like a boulder, a brain like a boiling tea kettle, and a sword made from a temple pillar, there's no way this guy can be weak. God Hand is too OP, so it's been sealed away.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
きゅうけつサーヴァント
拷問吸血大好き人間。エリザベートちゃんが道を誤って成長したらこうなってしまうらしい。すぐに宝具を撃ってくるので怖い。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
吸血从者
最喜欢拷问和吸血的人。如果伊丽莎白小姐走上错误的成长道路的话就会变成这样。快速地放出宝具，好恐怖啊。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bloodsucker-Type Servant

LOVES BLOOD! Also torture. If you do a bad job leveling and evolving Elizabeth, this is how she ends up. She uses her Noble Phantasm at the drop of a hat, which is kinda scary.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
おどりこサーヴァント
踊りが得意でどんな踊りでもこなせるが、どんな踊りでもエッチな踊りになるぞ。安来節でエッチになったときは、さすがに周囲がざわめいた。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
舞娘从者
擅长跳舞，什么舞都能跳，但无论跳什么舞都会变得色气的。当安来节也变得这样色气的时候，想必会在周围引起骚动的吧。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Dancer-Type Servant

An outstanding dancer, she is able to master any form of dance that has been created. However, she also makes all her dances erotic. When she turned a traditional folk dance into a display more erotic than any pole dance, it caused some commotion.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
かめんサーヴァント
いつも歌っている、育てるのが難しいサーヴァント。きちんと育てないとマスターを骨にしようとするので気をつけよう。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
假面从者
总是在唱歌，是很难培养的从者。但如果不好好培养，他就会试着把御主变成骨头，所以要小心啊。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Masked-Type Servant

He's always singing, and he's difficult to level. If you don't level him enough, he might turn you, his Master, into a pile of bones. Exercise caution.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
くびきりサーヴァント
セレブの首を斬る仕事をしている人。マリー・アントワネットに足を踏まれて興奮してマリーファンクラブ会員になった。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
斩首从者
做着为名流斩首工作的人。因为被玛丽·安托瓦内特用脚踩到过而兴奋起来，成为了玛丽粉丝俱乐部的会员。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Decapitation-Type Servant

He beheads famous people. He gets aroused when Marie Antoinette steps on him. He's a member of the Marie Fan Club.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
しかくサーヴァント
いつも酔っ払っているので、楽しそうなサーヴァント。お酒さえあれば、勝手に成長するので便利。傍若無人モードになると、周囲の誰彼構わず絡んでくるから要注意だ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
刺客从者
因为总是喝醉，所以看上去总是乐呵呵的从者。只要有酒就能自由的成长，倒是很方便。要是进入了旁若无人模式，无论周围是谁她都会毫不介意地缠上，要小心啊。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Assassin-Type Servant

A Servant who seems to be drunk and having fun all the time. Levels up on her own as long as she has alcohol. Pretty convenient. Be careful, when she gets too drunk she'll start bothering anyone around her.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ごるごんサーヴァント
人間にはあまり懐かない女神サマ。ごるごんサーヴァント達のリーダーのような存在であり、特にメドゥーサにはお姉さんとしてふるまう。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
戈耳工从者
不太喜欢接近人类的女神大人。是戈耳工从者中领袖一般的存在，尤其在美杜莎面前，喜欢摆出姐姐的架子。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Gorgon-Type Servant

A goddess who doesn't like humans. The leader of the Gorgon-type Servants. She acts like an older sister, especially around Medusa.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
あんさつサーヴァント
地味ながらいい仕事をすると高評価。腕が長いので屋根の下とか手入れする時にも高評価。夜の廊下で会うと怖い。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
暗杀从者
虽然不起眼，但工作做得很好，从而得到了很高的评价。因为手臂很长，所以在修整屋檐下的时候也备受好评。不过要是晚上在走廊上遇见的话会很恐怖。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Assassination-Type Servant

He may not stand out like other Servants, but he gets the job done. His arm is long so he can reach up and grab stuff for you from those high, hard-to-reach places. Kinda scary if you run into him at night.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
むめいサーヴァント
なんかすごい剣技を修得しているが特に自慢してこない風流サムライ。カルデアでいちばんサーヴァントライフを満喫しているかんじ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
无名从者
虽说不知从哪里修得了很厉害的剑术，但却并不引以为傲，是一位风流的武士。感觉他似乎尤其对迦勒底的从者生活乐在其中。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Nameless-Type Servant

He seems to have mastered some insane sword technique, but he doesn't brag about it. What a cool samurai. He is quite enjoying his life as a Servant in Chaldea.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ケルトサーヴァント
最も落ち着いた雰囲気のクー・フーリン。火を吹く。面倒見がいい。布面積の多い服を着ているが、できれば脱ぎ捨てたいと思っている。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
凯尔特从者
气氛最沉稳的库·丘林。会吹出火。很会照顾人。虽然穿着布料面积很大的衣服，却在想着找个机会直接脱了丢掉。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Celtic-Type Servant

The calmest of the Cú Chulainns. He breathes fire and takes care of others. He wears clothes that cover him a lot more than the others, but he secretly wants to take them off.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
はたらきサーヴァント
諸葛孔明に仕事を押しつけられた可哀想なおじさん。恨むのならその性能を恨むんだな。目を離すと子供になっている。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
上班从者
被诸葛孔明强塞了很多工作的可怜大叔。要恨就恨自己的性能吧。一不注意就会变成小孩。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Working-Type Servant

A poor sap onto whom Zhuge Liang foisted all his work. It's his own fault for being so capable. If you take your eyes off him, he gets younger.

aprilFoolAssets: https://fgo.wiki/images/f/f2/沃尔夫冈·阿马德乌斯·莫扎特-愚人节2020.png?sha1=4865064581a70706f821c42ae28ff9409bdc751c
https://fgo.wiki/images/3/39/沃尔夫冈·阿马德乌斯·莫扎特5.png?sha1=4f62cae0d1e2e4185c85e78d8adf4379dc472472

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
おんがくサーヴァント
誰もが知ってる名曲群を書いた天才音楽家だが星が１でかわいそうだ。下ネタが好きなことで有名だがＦＧＯ世界ではめったに言わない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
音乐从者
虽然他是家喻户晓的创作了众多名曲的天才音乐家，然而只有1星，看起来好可怜。他虽说同样因为喜欢黄段子而出名，然而在FGO的世界中却很少被提及。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Music-Type Servant

A genius composer famous around the world, but he's still just a 1-star Servant. Feels bad, man. He's also known for his scatological humor, but he doesn't do that so much in FGO.

36.mcLink: 沃尔夫冈·阿马德乌斯·莫扎特

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
えせあくまサーヴァント
何が楽しいのか、いつもニコニコ笑っている。油断すると、スニーク状態からポケットにグレネードもといちくたくくんを忍ばせてくるぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
伪恶魔从者
不知道在开心些什么，总是笑嘻嘻的。疏忽大意的话，他就会用潜行模式往你的口袋里藏手雷和爆弹虫。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Fake Demon-Type Servant

Always laughing. Kind of makes you wonder what the hell's so funny. Don't let your guard down around him or he might just plant a few grenades (Tick-Tocks) in your pocket.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ぶんごうサーヴァント
カルデアで、何か悪いことやヘンなことがあったら、まずはコイツに問い質そう。いつでもダラダラしているが、〆切時には噛みついてくることもあるので、注意しよう。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
文豪从者
要是迦勒底出了什么坏事或是怪事的话,先去质问他准没错。虽然平日里总是一副悠哉悠哉的样子，但是在截稿前几天会摆出一副臭嘴脸，这点需要注意。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Writer-Type Servant

If something bad happens in Chaldea, you should question him first. Seems lazy most of the time but can become aggressive when a deadline is near. Be cautious.

aprilFoolAssets: https://fgo.wiki/images/0/0c/汉斯·克里斯蒂安·安徒生-愚人节2020.png?sha1=4b373bd7df0df0deb989f3c4c364c6fa45ce15bd

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
どうていサーヴァント
子供のクセに『人生の道程はきびしいものだ』とか遠回しに説教する。やれ執筆したくないとうるさいが、NPが貯まればあっさり書き上げるさぼり魔。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
童贞从者
虽说他还只是个孩子，却总是说着『人生不易啊』，委婉地进行说教。整天嘟囔着如何不想干活，一旦NP积攒够了还是会抓起笔来胡乱写上一通的偷懒狂。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Virgin-Type Servant

He's just a kid, but loves to lecture people and complain about how hard life is. He whines every day about how he doesn't want to write, but once his NP Gauge is full, he writes nonstop. Slacker.

33.mcLink: 汉斯·克里斯蒂安·安徒生

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
あおひげサーヴァント
ジャンヌが好きすぎてとうとうこんな感じになってしまった。ここまで目が飛び出したらもう手遅れだ。子供を近づけてはいけないぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
蓝胡子从者
由于太过喜欢贞德终于变成了这幅样子。眼睛瞪到了这个程度，为时已晚。千万不能让小孩子靠近。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bluebeard-Type Servant

He loves Jeanne so much that it twisted him into his current state. Now that his eyeballs have popped out like this, he is beyond saving. KEEP AWAY FROM CHILDREN.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
まじょサーヴァント
あくにん風だが付き合いだすとただのいい人だと分かる。親身になってくれるのでこっちが申し訳ない。でも怒らせるとノータイムで短刀を刺してくるぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
魔女从者
虽说是恶人风格，一旦交往过后就会发现她其实是个好人。她会设身处地为你着想，反倒是你会觉得不好意思。但如果惹她生气的话，那她会飞快地刺出匕首。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Witch-Type Servant

She acts like a villain, but once you get to know her, you'll find she's actually very sweet. After she warms up to you, you'll feel bad for ever thinking she was a villain. Do be careful not to make her mad, though. She may stab you with her dagger.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
せいじょサーヴァント
まぎれもなく神に仕える清らかな乙女だがなぜか無理しているように見える。神に背く者には容赦なくビームを放つ。亀の扱いがうまい。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
圣女从者
毫无疑问，这是一位侍奉神明的纯洁少女，但不知为何看起来有些勉强自己。对于背弃神明之人会毫不留情地发射光束。很擅长操控乌龟。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Holy Maiden-Type Servant

She's the very picture of a pure and virtuous maiden who serves the Lord, but somehow, it seems like a facade. Those who trespass against the Lord will get a laser beam to the face. Also an able turtle-handler.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
プリンセスサーヴァント
キラキラ輝いているお姫さま。慈愛に満ち誰にでも心優しいが金銭感覚が庶民とは違うので、養うのは難しいかもしれない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
贵族女子从者
闪闪发光的公主大人。虽说满怀慈爱，对谁都很是温柔，然而她的金钱观和庶民有很大的不同，想要养她可能很是困难。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Princess-Type Servant

A princess who shines brighter than any star. Her heart overflows with compassion, and so she is kind to all. However, her lack of good money sense makes her one of the more difficult Servants to raise.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
おとこのこサーヴァント
孔明ことエルメロイⅡ世と仲が良い美少年サーヴァント。生徒属性を持っている。進化するとイスカンダルになるが、進化のためには特別なアイテムが必要。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
男孩子从者
和孔明，也就是埃尔梅罗Ⅱ世关系很好的美少年从者。具有学生属性。进化后会变成伊斯坎达尔，不过需要特殊物品才能进化。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Cute Boy-Type Servant

A good-looking Servant who gets along with Zhuge Liang, aka Lord El-Melloi II, extremely well. He has the Student attribute and can evolve to become Iskandar. A special item is required to evolve him.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
くれいじーちゅうけんサーヴァント
よく懐くが暴走が激しい。少し放置すると、手柄を求めてデーモンの首を引き千切ってくる。要るのは心臓なのだと、何回言っても理解してくれない（返事はする）。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
狂热忠犬从者
虽说很容易亲近但是行动常常过激。稍微放着不管就会为了寻求功劳去砍碎恶魔的头。需要的是心脏啊，不管说多少次都不理解（回复倒很积极）。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Crazy Loyal-Type Servant

She quickly warms up to her Master but becomes unstoppable once she's gone berserk. Leave her alone too long and she will go out on her own and bring you back a daemon's head. No matter how many times you tell her you want the heart instead, it all goes in one ear and out the other.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
おかあさんサーヴァント
本人はお姉さんと言うものの実際はお母さんっぽいとの評判。料理がうまい。泣いた子をあやすのもうまい。子守歌もうまい。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
妈妈从者
尽管她本人认为自己是大姐姐，但实际上在大家看来完全是一副妈妈的样子。她擅长做饭。同样擅长抚慰哭泣的孩子。也很擅长唱摇篮曲。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Mom-Type Servant

She claims to be more of a big sister but everyone thinks she's much more like a mom. She's good at cooking, calming down crying kids, and can even sing a lullaby.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
かいぞくサーヴァント
エッチな妄想をすることに関しては、右に出るものがいないぞ。首は切り離すことが可能だが、生えてはこない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
海盗从者
关于桃色幻想，无人能出其右。脑袋虽然可以切下来，但长不出新的。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Pirate-Type Servant

He has the dirtiest mind and the most perverse fantasies by far. His head can be detached from his body. Note that once the head is detached, he doesn't grow a new one.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
せいじんサーヴァント
がんじょうで、殴っても蹴っても平気な顔をしている。カメラが趣味なので、きっといやらしい写真もたくさん撮られるだろう。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
圣人从者
很结实，不管挨打还是被踢，他都一副满不在乎的表情。因为爱好摄影，一定拍了很多色色的照片吧。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Saint-Type Servant

Extremely tough. No matter how hard you hit him, he will not so much as flinch. Since photography is his hobby, he probably has a lot of sexy pictures of other Servants.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ごるごんサーヴァント
あふれる目力をアイマスクで隠すシャイなセクシーお姉さん。でも格好はきわどい。二人のお姉さんによわい。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
戈耳工从者
用眼罩遮住溢出的目光，害羞的性感大姐姐。但外表看上去有些危险。面对自己两个姐姐时很弱势。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Gorgon-Type Servant

A sexy big sister who hides her petrifying gaze behind an eye mask and tends to wear revealing clothing. Her weakness is her two small big sisters.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
けんこくサーヴァント
こうていサーヴァント達のご先祖。赤くて金色でとても大きい、古代ローマを建国したといわれる伝説の存在。やさしい。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
建国从者
皇帝从者们的先祖。又红又金而且特别大，据说是建立了古代罗马的传说中的存在。很和蔼。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Founder-Type Servant

Ancestor of the Emperor-type Servants. Red, gold, and huge. The legendary figure who founded the Roman empire. Really kind.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
すぱるたサーヴァント
何はなくとも筋肉、筋肉だ。体は筋肉でできている。血潮は熱くて心は鉄筋コンクリート。幽霊が苦手で、出会う度にサイコロ３つ振って出た数を正気度からマイナスしなくてはならない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
斯巴达从者
别的都无关紧要，重要的是肌肉，肌肉。身为肌肉所成。血潮滚烫，心似钢筋混凝土。不擅长对付幽灵，每次遇到都必须掷3个骰子然后扣除相应的理智值。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Sparta-Type Servant

He is 100% muscle. I am the fiber of my muscle, concrete is my body and heat is my blood. He's afraid of ghosts. Roll 3d6 and deduct the total from his Sanity on each encounter with a ghost.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ケルトサーヴァント
クー・フーリンに進化する前の、若さにあふれたクー・フーリン。若いぶん血気さかん。イヌが友達。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
凯尔特从者
进化为库·丘林之前的，洋溢着青春气息的库·丘林。年轻而血气方刚。和狗是好朋友。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Celtic-Type Servant

Young Cú Chulainn prior to his evolution into blue bodysuited Cú Chulainn. Full of youthful energy. Very fond of dogs.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
におうだちサーヴァント
実は弁慶の偽物であるが、「弁慶殿は素晴らしい……おっと、私が弁慶でした！」とわざとらしいため、カルデアのみんなにはバレている。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
仁王立从者
他其实是假冒的弁庆，但因为他总是刻意地念叨着「弁庆阁下好棒啊……哎呀，我就是弁庆啊！」而被迦勒底的众人识破了。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Standing-Type Servant

He's actually a fake Benkei, but since he always says stuff like "Lord Benkei is truly splendid... Oops, I forgot, I AM Benkei," all of Chaldea is aware of this deception.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
とかげサーヴァント
アイドルとしてＦＧＯ世界でも一番の人気を誇る美少女サーヴァント。音痴と言われることもあるがアイドルは音痴でも問題ないのだ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
蜥蜴从者
作为偶像，在FGO世界里也是人气最高的美少女从者。虽然有时候会被说五音不全，但是因为是偶像，所以就算五音不全也完全没问题。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Lizard-Type Servant

The cutest Servant idol in the FGO world. She's a wretched singer, but according to her that doesn't really matter for a pop idol.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ケルトサーヴァント
バトルは大好きだけど理由のないバトルはイヤという、礼節のわかる乱暴アニキ。星３にあるまじき性能を持つと言われる。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
凯尔特从者
虽说喜好战斗，但讨厌无缘无故的战斗。是通礼数而性情粗暴的大哥哥。据说他拥有着3星从者所不该有的性能。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Celtic-Type Servant

A violent big bro who likes battle, though only with just cause. Surprisingly well-mannered. He's said to have a skill set rarely seen in 3-star Servants.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
すてらサーヴァント
ニシアジア地方ではとても有名だが、日本では知る人ぞ知る幻のサーヴァントだった。一生に一度だけステラする。目がいい。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
流星一条从者
在西亚地区很有名，但在日本只有本就了解他的人才会知晓的幻之从者。一生只能使用一次流星一条。视力很好。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Stella-Type Servant

Widely known in western Asia, but a Mythical Servant known only to enthusiasts elsewhere. Able to use Stella only one time in his life. Has very good vision.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ごるごんサーヴァント
イタズラが好きな小さいお姉さん。ごるごんサーヴァントの中では比較的育てやすく、アステリオスと一緒にしておくとおとなしい。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
戈耳工从者
喜好恶作剧的小个子姐姐。她在戈耳工从者中算是比较好伺候的，和阿斯忒里俄斯在一起时会乖乖的。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Gorgon-Type Servant

The small big sister. She has a thing for pranks. Much easier to raise compared to other Gorgon-type Servants. Being around Asterios makes her more manageable.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
けものサーヴァント
なつきにくい癖に、いったんデレると容赦がない。四足歩行で走る方が、二足歩行より心持ち早い気がすると自分では思っている。実際は遅い。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
野兽从者
明明难以亲近，可如果害羞起来就不会客气。自认为比起双足行走，四足行走感觉会更快。其实是更慢啦。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Beast-Type Servant

Takes a long time to warm up to you, but once she does, she won't let you go. She believes she runs faster when she's on all fours. She doesn't.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
もりサーヴァント
やる気のない世話好きお兄さん。自称ひねくれ者。毒をまぶして相手をせんめつするぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
森林从者
没有干劲但又好管闲事的大哥哥。自称是性格别扭的人。靠用毒击退敌人。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Forest-Type Servant

A nosy big brother who is also completely unmotivated. He claims he's cynical. He eradicates his enemies with poison.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
きんいろサーヴァント
この世のすべてをほしいままにする我様サーヴァント。ものすごく態度がでかく懐かせるのは至難の業だが、偉そうなだけあって有能だぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
金色从者
他是一位想要将世间万物皆纳为己有的傲慢的从者。尽管因其为人处世的态度无比自大傲慢而让人很难亲近他，但他确实拥有当得起自己那份自以为是的才能。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Gold-Type Servant

A selfish and kingly Servant who wants to claim everything valuable in this world as his own. He's so full of himself that getting him to like you is nearly impossible. He can walk the walk, though.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
むめいサーヴァント
地元のヒーロー的な一般人がサーヴァントになったらしい。やたらとニヒルな物言いがかっこいいおにいさん。英語が話せる。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
无名从者
似乎是当地英雄一样的普通人成为了从者。总是说些冷言冷语的帅气大哥哥。还会说英语。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Nameless-Type Servant

Apparently a slightly heroic average Joe that became a Servant. A cool dude who speaks all mysterious-like. He can speak English.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
かわいいサーヴァント
男性か女性かよく分からないがかわいいことに変わりはないサーヴァント。マリーファンクラブ会員のひとり。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
可爱从者
尽管分不清该从者是男生还是女生，但可爱是不会改变的。是玛丽粉丝俱乐部的成员之一。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Cute-Type Servant

Their cuteness transcends gender boundaries. One of the members of the Marie Fan Club.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
あおひげサーヴァント
ジャンヌ・ダルクのことが好きすぎる変なおじさん。目はまだ小さいので比較的安全。旗を見ると嬉しくなって突撃する習性がある。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
蓝胡子从者
过于爱戴贞德的怪叔叔。因为现在是小眼睛状态所以还比较安全。有看到旗子就会兴冲冲地发动突击的习性。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bluebeard-Type Servant

He's a weird dude who is completely obsessed with Jeanne d'Arc. His eyeballs aren't popping out quite yet, so he's safe...ish. Tends to charge into battle whenever he sees a flag.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
だいおうサーヴァント
文明と見ればつい破壊してしまうかわいい戦闘特化型サーヴァント。きちんとしつければ良い文明と悪い文明を見分けられるようになる。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
大王从者
只要看到文明就总会想着将其破坏，是可爱的战斗特化型从者。好好管教的话，还是可以分辨好文明与坏文明的。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Magister-Type Servant
She's absolutely adorable, but since she specializes in combat now that she's a Servant, she tends to want to destroy whole civilizations at the drop of a hat. With enough training, she can tell good civilization from bad civilization.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
こうていサーヴァント
肥沃な環境で育ったため、とてもふくよか。そのわりに俊敏でずるがしこく、口車で他人を働かせるのが上手だ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
皇帝从者
因为在富饶的环境中长大，所以才会非常丰满。与外表正相反，为人机敏狡诈，非常善于用花言巧语说服别人。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Emperor-Type Servant

His plump figure reflects the very comfortable environment in which he was raised. Despite his looks, he is both clever and cunning, excelling at making other people do the work for him.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
すまないサーヴァント
竜の体液を全身に浴びてみたことで有名。高潔すぎるため人一倍腰が低く、すぐ謝ってしまうぞ。背中が敏感。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
对不起从者
因曾经试着将全身浸泡在龙的体液中一事而出名。因为品行太过高洁，所以对人会成倍谦逊，并且会飞快地道歉。后背很敏感。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Sumanai-Type Servant

Famous for bathing in the blood of a dragon. Noble, honorable, and with a tendency to apologize for everything. His back is his weak point.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
こうていサーヴァント
自分で言うには万能で天才で芸術にも精通している。尊大でわがままだが愛情によわいので世話をするのはあまり難しくない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
皇帝从者
按她自己的话来说她本人无所不能、天赋绝伦，且精通艺术。尽管她既高傲又任性，但因其不擅应对亲爱之情，故而照顾她也不算太难。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Emperor-Type Servant

Self-proclaimed omnipotent genius and master of the arts. Acts like she owns the place and can be quite selfish, but since she falls in love with just about everyone, she's not so hard to deal with.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
アルトリアサーヴァント
アルトリアに進化する前の、世間の厳しさを知らない綺麗なアルトリア。このまま育ててもアルトリアにはならない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
阿尔托莉雅从者
这位是进化成为阿尔托莉雅之前的、不知世间疾苦的清纯美丽的阿尔托莉雅。就算照这样一直培养下去也不会变成阿尔托莉雅。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Artoria-Type Servant

Artoria before she evolves into Artoria.
So pure, much cuteness. She knows nothing of the harshness of this cruel world. Without your intervention, she will not become THE Artoria so long as she continues on this path.

aprilFoolAssets: https://fgo.wiki/images/9/96/阿尔托莉雅·潘德拉贡·Alter-愚人节.png?sha1=deeb9c9624e5b13803b3237f433bea703b12c99a

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
アルトリアサーヴァント
品種の多いアルトリアの中でもかなり凶暴な性格。栄養バランスを考えずに食事を与え続けるとこうなると言われている。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
阿尔托莉雅从者
她拥有着即使在品种众多的阿尔托莉雅之中也堪称十分凶暴的性格。据说如果不考虑营养平衡一直为阿尔托莉雅提供饮食就会变成这个样子。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Artoria-Type Servant

So angry, much hungry. She's said to be the most violent breed of all the Artoria types. According to rumor, Artoria evolves into this form if she's fed enough junk food.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
アルトリアサーヴァント
一般に最もよく認知されたサーヴァント。真面目な性格でマスターに忠実で、気難しいところもあるがご飯をたくさん与えればよく懐く忠犬。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
阿尔托莉雅从者
一般来说最为熟悉的从者。性格认真，对御主十分忠诚，虽然也有一些很难伺候的地方，但只要给她大量食物的话就会变成十分亲近你的忠犬。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Artoria-Type Servant

The face of this world-dominating franchise. So serious, much loyal. Might be a handful to deal with at times but she will be forever loyal to her Master. As long as she's fed. Constantly.

aprilFoolAssets: https://fgo.wiki/images/3/3f/玛修·基列莱特-卡面-y(奥特瑙斯).png?sha1=6597f5dfbc279a7781dcf7c558bb2d6afe87fd5c

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
なすびサーヴァント
なすび色の体はやわらかそうだがあらゆる攻撃を跳ね返すほど頑丈だ。まじめそうに見えるがついエッチなことを考えてしまう。

なすびサーヴァント
なすびの力を失ったマシュがダ・ヴィンチちゃんの力によって強引になすびを再現してもらった。以前よりは弱体化している。ヘッドセットでいつでもどこでも動画が見放題だ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
茄子从者
茄子色的身体看上去软软的，但其实很结实，可以抵抗住各种攻击。虽然看上去很正经，但不知不觉中就会开始考虑色色的事情。

茄子从者
失去茄子之力的玛修，在达芬奇亲的力量下强行重现了小茄子的形态。比以前削弱了一些。用那个头戴式接收器无论何时何地都可以随便看动画。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Eggplant-Type Servant

Her perfect, eggplant-colored body is soft, yet durable enough to tank any attack. She may look like an innocent kouhai, but her mind can be quite filthy.

profile.NA:
A school for the younglings who dream of becoming tomorrow's SSR Servants.


With the founding President God Blessed Edison as the lead, the veteran Servants full of experience on active duties teach cheerfully, freely, and magnificently.


The firm and reliable women dormitory leader is going strong as well.

As someone worthy of being called the King of Heroes, he does not make any oversights regarding his preparation for the festival.

While the King of Heroes of Earth and the King of Heroes of the Universe are of different universes, both of them are thorough in their works.


Furthermore......

It seems the honourary president and the Goddess of Abundant Harvest have also been recruited.

A formerly villain company that was hired to do assassination, now carries out information gathering and marketing works.


The great efforts of the capable section chief and the talented secretary really shine through when being put against the company president' whims.

The singer P, who sunk under the electron sea, has also come back.

It seems that Oshizu (currently Poison Kiss), who has given her letter of resignation, is still occasionally helping out with the company's operation as a subcontractor.

profile.CN:
以发现了休刻翁粒子而闻名的，
世纪的天才魔术师（Caster）。

为了调查地球上的纽约是否也会有粒子反应，
到处埋头实地考察。

因为能轻松地将对方变成爱猪，
遇到她的时候要小心。
profile.NA:
The genius caster of the century, who was known for having discovered the Kykeon particle.


To find out if there are any reactions to the particles in New York, Earth, she has been doing fieldwork all over the places.


Since she would casually turn others into piglets, be careful when you encounter her.

Thunder and lightning descend upon the skyscraper―――to meet the hope and the budget entrusted to him.


"Thunder has descended! Lightning full throttle!

Fuhahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha!

Now then, Master, let's go win this thing!"

profile.CN:
于神之居所弹奏的、慈爱的旋律。

既没有什么大书特书的才能、亦没有过人的技巧、
甚至连表达感情的温度也欠奉的演奏―――

却让人联想起了比那天边还遥远的地方存在着的、
无人的荒野、和虔诚的祈祷。
profile.NA:
A melody of love being played in the House of God.


The musical performance that shows neither any emotions, any outstanding techniques, nor any talent worth being mentioned―――makes you think of devout prayers and an uninhabited wasteland, at this place that is still so far from heaven.

A false dream that continues to go around the paradise of innocence.

The clumsy mage who has been refusing to wake up and let her daily life shatters, comes to a stop.


Now that she has become the last audience, she turns her back on the exit.

profile.CN:
美丽的白银色少女坐在那里。

冰冷的城堡中，独自一人。
带着能俘获所有人的微笑，
轻吟着能吸引所有人的歌。

她的身上围绕着黄金色的威风。
profile.NA:
A beautiful silver maiden is sitting.


All by herself, in the freezing castle.

Showing a smile that captives everyone and humming a song that charms anyone.


Putting on a golden majesty.

profile.CN:
「嗯嗯嗯嗯嗯嗯！　　
　……稍微有些偏右了吧。真是挥不出精妙的一球啊。」
「嗯，好球！虽然看起来有点古怪，进攻方式却很光明正大的啊，道满！
　那么，下一个轮到我了。虽然有点蛮横，但还是试试以“一杆上果岭”为目标！」
（和两个力量型选手在场地上比赛球的飞行距离真是愚蠢透顶，以对方软肋决胜负，腰也会很痛——！）

晴朗的太阳下。
对现代运动有兴趣的杰出人物们。

虽然一副很清闲的样子，却在有输赢概念的竞技上看重自己的脸面……
profile.NA:
Douman: "Nnnnngh! I think it deviated slightly to the right. It seems I was unable to perform an exquisite swing."

Iskandar: "Mm, nice shot! Strange as his appearance may be, that was a magnificent line of attack, Douman! Now then, it's my turn. It might be next to impossible, but let's try for a hole-in-one!"

Moriarty: "(It would be a fool's errand of me to compete against two power-obsessed types based on distance on a par-five hole, so I'll have to play it safe. Plus my back hurts!")


Under the blazing sun.

A group of remarkable figures are playing modern sports.


Although the atmosphere is casual, there's no way that these men wouldn't get serious about a competition in which the concept of winning or losing exists...

profile.CN:
「哟，曼迪卡尔多。
　听说了吗？
　现在肉包子便宜了50日元哟。」
「今天打工的工资发啦，我连果汁的份一块请客！你会来吧？」
「啊，是。我会去的。多谢款待！」

不知道在旁人眼里是什么样子，不过他们总是像这样关系很好的样子。大概。
profile.NA:
Caenis: “Yo, Mandricardo. Didya know? There’s a 50 yen discount on meat buns today.”

Mori Nagayoshi: “I got paid from my part-time job today. I’ll bring some juice and treat you, so you better stop by, aight?”

Mandricardo: “Ah, okay. I’ll stop by. I appreciate it, really!”


Who knows how this scene looks to someone passing by, but this is just how they get along. Maybe.

profile.CN:
「这是永远不会怀疑明天来临的
　因你们人类的傲慢导致的结局。
　本是圆环的道路，渐渐地，找到了终点站」

在银河的尽头发生的扭曲之下
如同锁链一般被扭转的人类历史，
如今，迎来了终结。

「我，我们！
　要用自己的双手选择（应对）未来！」
「海鸟，向往陆地（希望）。
　纵使前方天空雷云密布。」

他们编织出的许多羁绊，
究竟能否平安无事地救济世界呢！？
profile.NA:
Enkidu: "This is what the pride of you humans have brought upon yourselves, who never doubted that tomorrow would always come. This circular path has finally reached its terminus.”


The history of mankind, which has been twisted like a chain by the strain generated at the edge of the galaxy, is now coming to an end.


Paris: “I–no, we–are going to decide (deal) our future ourselves!”

Nemo: “Seabirds always aim for land (hope). Even if there are thunderclouds in the sky ahead.”


Will the numerous bonds they weave be able to save the world and keep it safe?!

profile.CN:
看着借列车之旅留下回忆的乘客
列车员露出腼腆的笑容。

「客人哟，搭乘感受还好吧。
　如有需要，请尽管说。」
「谢谢。这客房真是好极了。
　旅行期间就交给你了。」

看门人微笑地照看着他们。
因为他知道列车员直到今天都在做着真挚的准备。

「真是个明朗的开始呀。
　愿我等的旅途有伟大的幸运相助…！」
profile.NA:
The conductor smiles modestly at the passengers as they reflect upon their train journey.


Karna: "Esteemed Guest, I hope you are enjoying your ride. If you need anything, please don't hesitate to ask."

Zhuge Liang: "Thank you. This cabin is simply wonderful. I'll be in your care for the rest of the trip."


The porter watches over the scene with a smile.

It's because he knows that the conductor has been working diligently to prepare for this day.


Rama: "A bright start, indeed. Best of luck on our journey...!"

Tai Gong Wang: “So, my young lord. What can I do for you tonight? Are you trying to befriend me, perhaps?”

Lanling Wang: “What is your intent behind covering everything up like that again? Did you think I would not notice the barbaric acts you have fabricated?"


Rumor has it that bandits have appeared in the capital.

The ones who have been targeted, however, have been powerful people who line their own pockets, merchants who misuse their authority, and the scoundrels who act as their hunting dogs―


The young lord finally arrived at the residence of the mastermind believed to be a Taoist.

The piercing eyes of the old soldier stationed in the back stare pointedly at the young lord who appeared to question the Taoist’s true motives.


Li Shuwen: “If you do not have the resolve, it’d be best for you to leave.”


The young man stared at the sake cup he held in his hand, before drinking its contents down in one gulp.

profile.CN:
「犯人好像往小巷里逃了……
　这里要慎重前进，前辈。」
「哎呀哎呀，后辈。不要太紧张了。
　这种程度的话随便干干就行啦。」

为了解决事件，被匆忙安排在一队的两人。

虽然两人有着不同出身和经历，
却都有着向往正义的心——
profile.NA:
Percival: "It seems the culprit has escaped through the back alley...We should be careful, Senpai.”

Saito: "Now, now, my dear kouhai. No need to be so stiff. It's better to just do whatever comes to mind when it comes to these kinds of things."


These two were suddenly paired together to solve a case.


They may come from different origins and backgrounds, but they are united in their desire to pursue justice―

Amakusa: "Farewell, Mr. Detective..."


A huge organization comprised of many crime networks through Europe.

Detective Edmond travels around the country with a man who claims to be an ordinary trader, who contacted him for the bounty on the ringleader of that organization.


When I finally found him, the mastermind turned out to be a familiar face from the past.

That is what the detective mutters as he stands on the very cliff where that man disappeared.


Edmond: "Don't fuck with me......

If you runaway to hell, then hell is where I will go!

Because closing the curtains is a detective's (my) job!"

Columbus: "This is the ship that I got on, so I'll be sailing it with you until the very end."


――This will be his last case as a detective.

1568.mcLink: 侦探爱德蒙～最终事件篇～

profile.NA:
Cu Chulainn: “What’s the matter, Archer? You must be losing your touch as a sniper if you’re getting hit by a spearman’s gun of all things!”

Gilgamesh: “Hah, he must have been in the kitchen for too long. Constantly laboring away, for three full meals a day plus dessert!”

EMIYA: “Your surprise attack after hiding in the shallow water took me aback! And what’s more, you even have the latest state-of-the-art water gun! Seems like that spear you love to brag about has reached the end of its life!”

Cu Chulainn: “Hah, I only got this to match yours! I borrowed this from the Saber in the green cape!”

Gilgamesh: “Wha–?! Impossible, I’ve been sending petitions to loan it every five minutes, why are you the one in possession of the King of Knights’ gun?! And who gave you permission to enter this establishment when I exclusively reserved it in the first place?!”

Cu & EMIYA: (Quietly) “You did.”


“Waku Waku Zabuun” is a recreational area where citizens can come to relax.

profile.CN:
漫无目的地闲逛到一家酒吧时，
我遇到了一位带有奇特氛围的男子。
他带着嘲讽一般的语气，
轻快地说自己刚结束了一项大工作。

「我说，你是艺术商人吧？　从你的视线看出来的。
　你在习惯性地寻找这个店里最美的东西。」

男人对绘画很了解。
这可以称得上是奇妙的缘分了吧。
我们开始讨论这条街上的美术馆里的一幅画。提香的《天上的爱与人间的爱》。

「其实，我是个艺术白痴啊。
　我不懂什么是美。
　伟大的东西。整齐的东西。尊贵的东西。
　我明白什么东西是做得很好的，但也仅此而已了。
　我感受不到人人都在说的“爱”这个玩意儿啊。」

所谓的美，即为给人带来爱，或者说被赋予了爱的东西。
而男人似乎感受不到那份喜悦与充盈。

「美应该是过去式的。
　在失去之时。在损伤之时，才注意到
　这对自己来说是无可替代的。
　这不是称赞，而是哀悼。正是因为无法挽回，
　才会比任何东西都美丽。」

我没有表示赞同。
要说为什么的话，是因为——

「嗯。没错，兄弟。
　在为了感受爱而伤害到它的那一刻，
　我爱过的形式就会消失不见。
　一切都毫无意义。没有救赎，也没有回报。
　那么，从一开始就不该去爱，不是吗。」

男人像说着什么笑话一样，从座位上站起。
——仿佛让人联想到死亡一般，远处传来救护车的声音。
profile.NA:
I dropped by a bar where I met a man with a mysterious aura.

Just finished a job, the man casually mentioned. Mockingly, even.


“You’re an art dealer, aren’t you? I can tell from your gaze.

You’re looking for the most beautiful object in this establishment out of habit.”

The man was well-versed in the subject of paintings.

A strange coincidence, one might say.

He and I had a discussion about a painting on display at one of the museums in this city. [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Titian Titian]’s [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sacred_and_Profane_Love Sacred and Profane Love], specifically.


“To be honest with you, my appreciation for art could use some work.

I don’t understand what is beautiful.

When it comes to celebrated pieces, well-composed works, or even sublime creations, I can tell for sure that those were made to a high standard of workmanship. But that’s it.

I can’t feel the so-called ‘love’ that society speaks of.”


Beauty is the reciprocity of giving and receiving love.

Apparently, this man can’t experience such joy and satisfaction.


“Beauty should be in the past tense.

Only when you lose or damage something do you realize how irreplaceable it was to you.

That’s lamentation, not appreciation. What makes it more beautiful than anything else is the fact that you will never get it back.”


I couldn’t agree with him.

Because that’s—


“Yep, I get what you’re trying to say. And you’re right, my friend.

Any proof of my love is lost the moment I harm to feel love.

Completely meaningless, I tell you. No salvation, no recompense to be found.

So it’s actually pretty simple then: Just don’t love in the first place.”


The man replied as if he’s telling an amusing story, then he left his seat.

―In the distance, an ambulance’s siren was blaring, evoking the image of death.

芝诺比阿的情人节巧克力。　　
高大的棕榈科枣椰子树上生长的果实，干燥后称为椰枣（每100g约266kcal）
在外面再包裹上微苦的巧克力（可可豆含量约50%）做成的东西。
与她那一丝不苟且大胆的性格如出一辙，味道的平衡完美，甜和苦的交响曲绝妙地演奏着。而且，不过分华丽的外形和朴素的味道，让人不知不觉一直吃下去。

途中，把她下厨的身姿与裸体围裙弄混的影之风纪委员长的袭击，是唯一最大的危机。

　就算历经各种各样的陷阱也没有放弃，终于在深夜完成了……
　这个令人讨厌的手工巧克力！」

得意洋洋地将御主引入梦中的世界，却不知发生了什么，把巧克力塞进御主嘴里后就匆忙跑走了。
之后向她道歉的结果却是：

「……什，什么啊，你的眼神，那温柔的表情！？
　光是看着就感觉胸口像要爆炸了一样——！？
　哈，是时候准备给帕尔瓦蒂诅咒回礼了吧！？
　可、可恶——！」

防御力低的魔王大人红着脸，很是生气。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Kama (Avenger).


"Fuhahahah! (Laughing in the most Demon King voice possible)

How unfortunate that an event called Valentine's Day, one that surely exists for the sake of corruption would happen just when the Demon King of Corruption decides to be serious, don't you think......?

I am definitely not going to let you get away.

Just look at my ultimate weapon.

This horrible handmade chocolate not only took all night to make, I also had to plan ahead, note it down and visualize it, procure the best ingredients without carefully paying attention to my budget, wake up early, sneakily do it by myself, work while imagining what kind of expressions Master will show me, and not give up even when I encountered various troubles.......!"


And she was fine with triumphantly dragging Master into the Dream World and all that, however, various things happened and she ended up shoving chocolates into Master's mouth then ran away.

Yet, she was still being thanked for it.


"What-What's wrong with you, looking at me so affectionately!? And why am I feeling like my heart is gonna explode just by looking at you!? What is this, Parvati even prepared a curse counter or something for you, didn't she!? The nerve of that-!"
It was said that the Demon King, who has low defense, turned bright red and went all sulky.

profile.CN:
少女达芬奇（Rider）赠予的情人节巧克力。

她将与恐龙们共度一夏的记忆，在巧克力蛋糕上尽情展现。
蛋糕是蓝色，也就是所谓的蓝色夏威夷。
「不吃就太浪费了！一起来吃嘛！」
她一边说一边将蛋糕切成小块，分给新所长和马修等人。大家边吃边热火朝天地聊起那个夏天的回忆。

这是我的宝物。
是和众人一同分享的，无可取代的回忆。

因为是仅此一夏，首屈一指的大冒险。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from the young Da Vinci (Ruler).


This chocolate cake represents the memories of the summer she spent with the Dinosaur.

Most of it is blue so maybe it has a, what do you call it, Blue Hawaii-ish taste or something.

This jewel is mine alone.

The irreplaceable experience I had with everyone.


The great adventure of one summer, the one only in the world that can’t be compared.

profile.CN:
夏洛特·科黛(Caster)赠送的情人节巧克力。

profile.CN:
阿纳斯塔西娅(Archer)赠予的情人节巧克力。

profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Anastasia (Archer).

profile.CN:
冲田总司〔Alter〕(Saber)和炼狱赠予的情人节巧克力。

Valentine's chocolate from Okita Souji (Saber Alter) and Rengoku.


Handmade chocolates by Majin-san and Rengoku, who worked all night to make them. They depict Majin-san, Rengoku, and Master getting along, holding hands, and having a fun and enjoyable journey on a faraway path. Nevertheless, it is no doubt a very wonderful trip to the sky.

―――Today is a fine day for afternoon naps, the three of us can sleep side-by-side.

profile.NA:
Present from someone who pretended to be Oberon.

profile.CN:

profile.NA:
Valentine's return gift from Percival.

In that case, Percival's actual past is different from the opera?

Only Percival himself knows the answer.

芭万·希赠予的情人节巧克力。

巴格斯特赠予的情人节巧克力。

profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolates from Barghest.

摩根赠予的情人节巧克力。

鹤小姐的两次报恩之物。

profile.NA:
Two items from Miss Crane to return the favour.


The first one is Valentine's chocolates.

Sweet confections she made with an idol she calls friend and sings together with her.

They make you think of rolling mayudama, young birds nestling in their nest, or the Pleaides of the Seven Sisters.

A crane robe for Master, whom she holds an endless amount of gratitude for, to wear.

After all, everything comes from the aspiration that you have nurtured.

伽拉忒亚赠予的情人节巧克力。

profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Galatea.

profile.CN:
马纳南·麦克·利尔持有的，能够在海上和陆地上奔驰的传说中的白马。有时它也会拉着战车。
马纳南是海神，因此也有说法认为这白马指的是海浪拍打出的白色泡沫。

「那是如同女神一般的我所使用的白马。
　简直是宝具级别的概念。
　啊，身为魔术师的我姑且也是会骑马的哦。
　在追赶封印指定对象的时候，视情况有时马比车
　和摩托更能派上用途。

　话虽如此……说到白马，就会有骑士和公主两人
　同乘的印象。该说是稍微有点过于浪漫了呢，
　还是该说太富有少女心了呢……不，我不是轻视
　的意思，只是稍微有点难为情……
　……总有一天我也……也不是没有可能……

　哎，你问对象？
　跟我同水平……就算不要求到那么高，该说希望会是个
　勇敢、博识、聪明、拥有统率力，被众人所喜爱，而且又
　不会因此而骄傲的谦虚的勇士吧……

　为什么听到这就离席了？
　太奢侈了？　只是在画饼充饥？
　不，会有的！　肯定会有的！　
　肯定只不过是我还没有遇到而已！」
profile.NA:
The legendary white horse owned by Manannán mac Lir, said to be able to run on both land and water. It is sometimes seen pulling a chariot too.

As Manannán is the God of the Sea, this white horse is thought to represent the white foam created by the billowing waters.


"The white horse used by the Goddess-like me, is it?

Truly a Noble Phantasm-rank Concept.

Well, as a mage, I can also ride a horse, more or less.

Depends on the situation, there are times a horse is more useful than a car or a bike when chasing a target designated for sealing.


Even so......a white horse makes me think of a Prince and a Princess riding on it together. It's a bit too romantic, or perhaps too girlish would be more apt......No, I don't mean to belittle it, rather, I'm just a little embarrassed......

......And it's not like I won't have...someone...in the future.....


Yes? What do I want in a partner?

I want a warrior who is brave, knowledgeable, wise, able to lead, loved by everyone.....not to mention, be my equal.....despite all that, they must not be haughty......


Why are you leaving?

Too excessive? A castle in the air?

No, that person exists! They definitely do! 

I just haven't met them yet, that’s all!"

"It'd be absurd if the species declined for reaching its limits. To prevent that, I'll purchase everything bad about you. The anger, jealousy, grudges, and resentment. You're not allowed to extinct on my watch. All you need to do is to keep demanding the products I offer."

口中冰凉甜美地融化开的冰激凌是堕落的味道。
在此之上再只选择喜好的口味叠上两层三层发出连续攻击，怎么可能有人能够抵挡呢？留到最后的松脆筒身也很美味哦。嚼嚼。

要是渴了，还有气泡直冒的碳酸饮料！
那可是滋滋作响哦——
你知道吗？很厉害对吧。为什么人类居然能发明出这么傻的饮料啊。
而且居然还说这样的饮料有夏天的味道……意思是在夏天热到爆炸所以就要喝气泡乱爆的饮料吗。
这也太好笑了吧。吸吸。

还有闪亮登场的超豪华芭菲！
新鲜的水果和甜~甜的奶油。
简直是吃也吃不腻的味觉万花筒！
这样的东西人类根本忍不住嘛。咬咬。

不止是食物，可爱的泳圈，快乐的水上游戏，还有很多很多。
无论如何，这个魔王准备的堕落套餐的效果绝对不容置疑。毕竟——

「嗯——果然夏天是最适合堕落的季节呢。夏天，
　最棒了！」

……魔王本人，似乎也无法从这份堕落中逃脱呢。
profile.NA:
"In the sweaty summer weather, the cold and sweet ice cream melting in your mouth tastes like corruption.
 
And after a nonstop combo of two or three rounds of your favorite flavors, there's no way you can resist, can you?
 
This last crispy corn will also taste delicious. Chew.


When you get thirsty, I'll be there to pop open some soda! Wow, look, it's fizzing.
 
You already knew it did that?
 
It's amazing, though. Why would humanity invent a drink this stupid? What part of this is summer-like...?
 
Is it because it's a bubbly drink and summer makes people bubbly?
 
Pretty lame pun, if that's the answer. Gulp.


A volumous tower of parfait! Fresh fruit and super sweet cream.
 
A true kaleidoscope of flavors, where you can eat all you want without ever getting tired of the taste! No human can resist this. Slurp."


It's important to note that it's not all food. She has her cute floating ring, fun sea bathing times, and a lot more.
 
This Demon King's corruption kit has no room for error. After all...


"Oh yes, summer really is the best season for corrupting people. I love the summer!"


the Demon King herself can't escape its corruption.

profile.CN:
旅行结束，回来后，我整理着行李。
虽然没有什么比得上铭刻在心中的回忆，
但是每当看到给我做的布偶时，
就会想起那场十分平静的告别，以及夏日的特异点。

吵闹着、慌乱着、挥洒汗水放声大笑，
奔跑、摔倒，再奔跑，一圈圈地打转迷路。
一句“好开心”道不尽，
一句“累坏了”说不清。
无论喜怒哀乐，全都挤得满满当当。
这是没有其他任何人的，独属于我的故事。

和伙伴们一起见过明灭闪烁的星空。
和伙伴们一同看过澄澈无垠的晴空。
就算想不出具体的什么，
我们也确实共享过美丽的事物了。

然后，面对着似是整理完毕又好像没整理过的行李，
我轻声对自己说一句，
「好了」。
profile.NA:
I put away my luggage after returning from the trip.

While there is nothing that can compare with the memories engraved in my heart, each time I look at the stuff animals they made for me, I would remember our parting, which was filled with tenderness, and then, I would recall that Summer Singularity.


It was boisterous, it was wild, we sweated, we laughed loudly, we ran, we fell, and then we ran again, we went around and around, and we got lost.

"Fun" is not the word to describe it, and "super" is not enough to explain it either.

Joy, anger, sorrow, and enjoyment, they are all packed in there.

It was a story that exists only for me and no one else.


I watched the glittering and sparkling starry sky with my friends.

And I watched the clear blue sky with them too.

Even if I cannot recall the details, we have definitely shared something beautiful with each other.


Standing in front of my luggage that looks like it has been tidied up in a way that looks like it hasn't been tidied up at all, I muttered one word, “Alrighty”.

profile.CN:

profile.NA:

At the end of the day, just because one has become a magician doesn’t mean that one would become skillful as well.

The things that you are not good at won’t suddenly become your forte.

In that case, all you have to do is to practice.


Please do not see through my shoddy performance.

Please do not stare at my hands that cannot stop trembling.


After all, human life is all about fighting with the cards you have, no matter how little talents you have.

Even though I am not good at this at all, these are my humble gifts to you.


The thundering applause, the cheers, and the smiles.

A dream moment, one that captivates you with its gorgeous illusion.

My everything.

profile.CN:
——传闻中无名的英灵
曾使用过的雌雄剑。

尽管起初只是微弱的火苗，最终却成为了烈焰，获得了名为炼狱的强大力量。同时，也在漫长的战斗中觉醒了自我，拥有了近似人类情感的存在。

就是这样，虽然说着什么好像很厉害的东西，不过说白了我就是把会说话的剑，也不是什么特别稀有的剑啦。对了，实际的性能在合体时会更高哦，本人都这么说了，信我准没错。现在这样，只不过是我在独立行动形态时考虑到各自的战斗方式，才分成雌雄双剑而已。
分成双剑时，较短的雄剑司掌主人的力之侧面，较长的雌剑则司掌技之侧面。

原本是不被容许、或许根本不存在的、很不起眼的夏日一刻。

哎呀，毕竟吃了那么多苦头，所以应该也能容许这一点点奇迹的发生吧。


——你说是吧，我终生的主人。
profile.NA:
―――A pair of male and female swords said to have been formerly wielded by a nameless Heroic Spirit.


It was once a small flame, however, before long, it has become a blaze, gaining a mighty strength and was called “Purgatory (Rengoku)”. And then, amidst the long battles, it became self-aware, and attained something that resembles a human's will.


Welllll, it sounds like I’m saying something snobbish here, but I am actually, how do you guys call it, a talking sword. Not that that kind of sword is rare though. By the way, the actual performance is superior when both swords are combined, since it’s said by the sword itself, it cannot be wrong. The pair of male and female swords are separated simply because I take into consideration the individual fighting style we have when we act independently.

When separated, the shorter male sword is in charge of strength, while the longer female sword is in charge of techniques.


It was a very tiny, insignificant moment of summer that shouldn’t have existed and shouldn't have been allowed to exist in the first place.


What, considering that we have been through so many horrible things, at least this kind of miracle should be allowed, you know?



―――Don't you agree, my life-long Master?

The people around me held expectations and obsession for my outstanding talents. 
But I can’t live up to those because of the way I am.


Although I felt no resentment, no hatred, no sorrow, 

I decided to sever my beloved hometown’s traditions and karma.


That’s who I am—a monster beyond salvation.


But then— 

I had a partner who shouldered my rage.

I had a junior who called me caring with a smile.

And I had somebody who understood who I am at my most beautiful.


They attest that I gained more than just dark memories from living my life true to myself.


I smile shyly atop the cliff of Samsara, accompanied by a beautiful twilight sky and a blow of refreshing breeze.

这是不曾讲述过的断章。

profile.NA:
The Princess of the Autumn Forest fell in love.

She fell in love with a Prince who looked like he was born a corpse.


While her forest friends were being merry about the arrival of the Prince, she alone was gazing at him from afar.


Even after the Prince recovered, and she caught a glimpse of his heart, the Princess’ heart remained unchanged.


It was a hangout for discarded faeries.

While he laughed at them for being the low-class in the Faerie Kingdom, the Prince did not move his home from the Autumn Forest at all.


After doing good things, he would be meticulously washing his hands in the forest’s river.

After doing bad things, he would collapse onto the fallen leaves with his wings still dirtied.


The Prince loathed all of Britain.

He also loathed the faeries and the forest friends.

However,


“I'm no god.

Even those who disappear if you leave them alone are too much for me to handle.”


Knowing what the Prince really hated, the Princess, until the very end, kept the fact that she flapped her wings for his sake to herself.


It's because she believes he was the only fire that could warm her cold limbs.


　　　◆


This is a literary fragment that couldn’t be told.

The story of a proud Princess, hidden by a big liar.

profile.NA:
This is the tale of a certain faerie.


“The preparation has been finished a long time ago.

Let’s get to measuring right away.”


After a looong training, and an even looonger slumber.

The faerie met the bride she has been waiting for again, and she tried her best to stop her tears from spilling out.


“It’s time to stop wearing that iron armour.

Let me prepare the best dress for you.”


For the happiest future.

For the most important memory.

For this day, she will show off the skills she has been polishing.


Like that, the most wonderful time for the faerie is over.

The figure of the bride wearing her finished dress that she has been dreaming of so many times was finally happening.


The bride, looking as if covered by stars, was very happy and thanked the faerie for it.

With that single word, the faerie’s journey came to an end safely.



On that note.


“―――Hmm, good morning, Mashu.

I’m so glad.

Being told that makes me very happy.”


Unfortunately, after this, the girl came to sleep in the ice coffin.

The faerie wanted to be the first one to greet her when she woke up, and to tell her how she feels, earlier than anyone else.

　大约在能被称为娱乐的方面全部获得成功的他，
　唯一，未能完成的大事业——
　那便是综合度假区的建设。
　我对那未竟之业感到可惜，
　故而成立了NFF Service。」
 
身着荷官制服的妖艳美女说道。
凭自己的权能建立都市不过小菜一碟。
然而，那样一来便失去了意义。
供人类享乐的都市，
一定要在人类的社会体系中建立起来才行。
无论成功还是破产，都不过是硬币表里。
为品味那悲喜轮转，全球最大的赌场度假区建成了。
看起来不过是个发带的巨大建筑，
正是建于那中心的灵魂象征。
 
「虽说如此，还请您不要错会。
　各位人类的欲望，
　说到底不过是装饰我头发程度的东西。
　一旦我腻烦了，只会轻轻摘下扔到海里。
　还请千万不要产生“被我所爱着”——
　之类的错觉哦？」
profile.NA:
“......Speaking of which, I haven’t told you about why I started the NFF Services, have I?

It is an entrepreneurship that serves as both a source of income and my hobby, however, it is not something that I founded because I want to......torment all of humanity, no, it’s not.

This Koyanskaya has but a single dream!”


She has respect for a certain human, the only one that she reveres.

The first of mankind who made gravure magazine and one who established trademark rights in a gigantic market.

The one who fought against racism while making liberal magazine, becoming the media’s darling, and facing many criticisms from society.


“A pompous and skilled perfectionist.

A seeker of fortune who was energetic in both work and sex.

There was only one business that guy, who was successful in anything remotely related to entertainment, couldn’t achieve―――

It was a Casino Resort establishment.

That’s why I started NFF, with regards to that unfinished business.”


The bewitching beautiful woman wearing dealer clothing talks about how it is easy to build a city with her own authority.

However, that would make it meaningless.

It needs to be a city built in the humans’ system, to give humans pleasure.

Success and bankruptcy are two sides of the same coin.

The largest Casino Resort in this planet was developed so you could taste that mixture of joy and sorrow.

The huge building that looks like a ribbon is a symbol of that spirit.


“On that note, I hope you don’t misunderstand.

After all, the likes of all humanity’s desire are only worth as much as some decorations for my hair.

Once I lose interest in it, I would pick it up and throw it to the sea without a second thought.

Please don’t make the mistake of thinking that you are being loved sincerely―――or something, ok?”

profile.CN:
这里是（不知不觉间）存在于新·迦勒底的一所伟大的图书馆。
不管它的成立经历了怎样的过程，它作为知识的宝库都是无可挑剔的，古今东西的一切正等待你的邂逅。

只要一次翻页，那跨越时光的思想，便会让你心满意足的吧。
profile.NA:
A great library (somehow) comes to be in Novum Chaldea.

Regardless of how it was established, it is perfect as a treasure trove of wisdom, waiting for all kinds of encounters at all times and places.


As you turn the pages one by one, you would surely be filled with emotions that transcended time.

profile.CN:
完成了七个特异点的战斗，
人理续存保障机构·迦勒底
终于到达了圣杯探索（冠位指定）的最终地点——
终局特异点，冠位时间神殿所罗门。

打倒一切的元凶魔神王所罗门，
夺回未来。
即将面对这一时刻的一行人
分别经历了各自的时间。

赌上迄今为止的众多邂逅，
以及众多未来，
藤丸与玛修终于要开始最后的作战了……
profile.TW:
經歷了七個特異點的戰鬥，
人理續存保障機構・迦勒底
終於到達聖杯探索（Grand Order）的最終地點——
終局特異點，冠位時間神殿所羅門。

打倒一切的元兇，魔術王所羅門，
取回未來。
臨近最終之刻的一行人，
度過了各自的時間。

賭上至今為止的眾多相遇以及未來，
藤丸與瑪修終於前往最後的作戰……
profile.NA:
After battling their way through all seven Singularities, the Chaldea Security Organization has finally arrived at the endpoint of the Grand Order: The Final Singularity, Grand Temple of Time: Solomon.

Now is the time to defeat the root of all evil, Solomon, the King of Mages. Now is the time to reclaim the future.
And with the final operation looming large, everyone prepares in their own special way.

All their many encounters have led to this moment as Fujimaru and Mash at last embark on their final operation...
profile.KR:
7개의 특이점에서의 싸움을 마치고,
드디어 성배탐색(그랜드 오더)의 최종지점───
종국특이점, 관위시간신전 솔로몬에 도달한
인리계속보장기관 칼데아.

모든 원흉인 마술왕 솔로몬을 쓰러뜨리고,
미래를 되찾는다.
그 순간을 눈앞에 둔 그들은, 각자의 시간을 보낸다.

지금까지의 수많은 만남,
그리고 수많은 미래를 걸고,
후지마루와 마슈는 드디어 최후의 작전으로 향한다.

profile.CN:
这把圣枪原本
应该被收存在合适的地方。
无论我在圆桌中身居一席是何等光荣，
它都不应是一介骑士所拥有之物。

但人理……
将这把圣枪——朗基努斯
选定为我的宝具。
也许迫近的危机，已然严重到了这等地步。

那么，我将予以回应，
我将手持圣枪，站立于战场最前线。
——御主，与你一同。
profile.NA:
By nature, this Holy Lance is something that should be kept in an appropriate place.

It is not something to be owned by a single knight, even if that person holds a seat in the glorious Round Table.


However, the Human Order has......made the Holy Lance my Noble Phantasm.

The Longinus, to someone like me.

To go as far as this, the approaching crisis must be significant.


Then, I shall respond to that.

I shall take up the Holy Lance, and stand on the front line of battles.

―――Together with you, Master.

profile.CN:
无论是多么丑陋的姿态，
无论生存方式是何等祸害，
那日所见的价值都不会改变。

比46亿年间的记忆更为耀眼的、反复无常的奇迹。
在下／我曾见过的，世上最美的东西。

即使这具身体崩溃，即使这颗心破碎，
我也不会失去憧憬。

秀丽的奥萝拉（极光）。
闪耀的星之容颜。
永恒不变的爱，就在这里。
profile.NA:
No matter how hideous of a being I am, no matter how evil my way of living is, the worthiness that I saw that day does not change.


A whimsical miracle that was more radiant than the memories of 4,6 billion years.

It was the most beautiful thing that I have seen on earth.


Even if my body was to shatter, even if my heart was to break into pieces, I will never stop yearning for it.

For the beautiful aurora.

For the visage of the shining stars.

For a forever unchanging love, at this place.

profile.CN:
「衣服呀，房子呀，料理呀。
　这些我还是知道的。嗯，我知道的。
　就算是妖精，这种程度还是会做的啦。
　但是连穿的鞋子都要认真考虑什么的，就做不到啦。
　真的不行。会当场晕倒的。
　毕竟那可是脚啊？　是脚后跟啊？
　要尽情装饰最敏感的部分啊？
　大胆、华丽、妖艳、优雅。
　我听说泛人类史已经没有魔法了，
　这可真是有眼无珠。明明有这么多魔法般的鞋子，
　都是妖精国见不到的东西。
　虽然用来看、用来穿、还是用来装饰都挺不错，
　但我的梦想果然还是拥有属于自己的一双鞋。
　只要一点点、一点点提高自己的手艺，就一定能接近一流水平的。
　你觉得到我做出理想中的鞋子需要花多少年？
　一年？　还是十年呢？
　如果到那会儿我还活着的话，
　到那时，你能收下一双作为纪念吗？」
profile.NA:
“Things like clothes, houses, or food.

I understand that much. Yes, I do.

Even those kinds of things are popular with the faeries, after all.

But, I can’t even with figuring out these shoe things.

Seriously I give up. My consciousness is leaving me.

It’s feet we’re talking about here? Them heels, you know?

You can decorate your most sensitive place to your heart’s content, you know? 

Bold, gorgeous, captivating, and elegant.

I have heard that there is no more magic in the Pan-Human History, but the peepholes finally became useful here.

I have never even seen this many magic shoes in the faerie realm.

They are nice to look at, wear, or decorate, but my dream is really to have my own pair of shoes.

Little by little, little by little, raise my skills and get closer to the first-class.

How many years do you think it would take to make my ideal shoes?

1 year? Or maybe 10 years?

If I’m still alive by then, at that time, please get me a pair of shoes in celebration?”

profile.CN:
那是黑犬公不为人知的爱好。
在休息日的午后，花上充足的时间，
来烹调拿手菜和新菜肴。

「既然有了伴侣这不是理所应当的吗。
……虽说如此，
我不会强迫你也如此。
因为我是出于喜欢才去这样做的。」

黑犬公这样讲道，脸上露出了满足的微笑，
就像是在说只要心爱的人能过来看看厨房的情况……
仅仅如此便已是幸福了。

这就是所谓的爱妻料理。
不过啊，对人类来说这尺寸是不是稍微有些太大了点？
profile.NA:
This is the secret hobby of Sir Black Dog.

On her days off, she spends all the afternoon cooking her specialty menu as well as cooking up new dishes.


“It’s a matter of course, as you can see, I have gained a partner.

......That said, I won’t force you to do the same thing.

This is just what I like to do, that’s all.”


Sir Black Dog has a satisfied smile on face as she says that.

As if to say that she would feel happy as long as an important person has come to see the state of her kitchen......


They are the so-called beloved wife dishes.

But hold up a minute, I think the portion might be too big for a human?

profile.CN:
这是湖中妖精被赐予的，
比世间万物都要珍贵、耀眼的东西。

它诞生于星之内海，
是只有流落到大地上的妖精才能被赐予的，
创造世界的祖母之证。
只要遵从于乐园的使命，
精灵终有一日会作为星辰之魂被迎接到此处。

——然而。
她说，那并非自己的愿望，
于是舍弃了被许诺下的荣耀而去。

治愈同伴的法杖变为打倒敌人的长枪。
眼中与生俱来的光亮在战斗中消散。
漫长的旅途行至尽头，一路走来失去了众多事物。

换来的是白垩的玉座。
是她曾不断祈求的，不列颠的故事。

……然而，她至今仍会想起。
在止境之国中被宠爱的那些时光。
被遗弃在优美的石之王座的，逝去之梦的代价。
profile.NA:
It’s the most precious and glorious thing that has been given to her by the faerie of the lake.


The symbol of the Great Mother who built this world, only given to faeries who were born in the bay of the stars, and washed ashore to Earth.

As long as they comply with the duty of paradise, they would eventually be able to become the spirits of the stars, that is the ultimate goals of the faeries.


―――However.

She abandoned the promised glory, saying that it was not her own desire.


The wand that heals her allies changed into the spear that brings down her enemies.

The light in her eyes that she was born with was lost in battles.

At the end of her long journey, she has lost a great many things.


What she got was a throne of white wall instead.

The legend of Britain that she kept wishing for.


......Yet, even now, she still remembers.

The beloved old days at the land at the furthest end.

The price of a bygone dream left behind in a gentle throne of stone.

profile.CN:
无论头脑、姿容，还是家境，
这些令人羡慕的东西他都有。

但唯独一样东西。
魔术的才能，他并没有。

他比任何人都清楚。
无论有多渴望，
无论积累多少钻研，
也会有绝对得不到的东西。
profile.NA:
Whether it's intellect, appearance, or pedigree, he had everything that make people envious.


But there is just one thing that he didn't have.

That is the talent for magecraft.


He knew that no matter how much he crave for it, no matter how efforts he put into studying, that there is something that he can never get.

profile.CN:
诞生的理由是―――为了消失。

如果要比喻的话、
就像是落在树梢上的积雪终将被阳光融化、
回归大地一般。

那是事先就被决定好的事情。
因为就是作为那样的事物而被制造出来的。

但即使是这样她也仍然在祈愿。
愿所爱之人获得胜利。
坚信着那才是作为人而活过的证明。
profile.NA:
The reason she was born―――is to disappear.


If a comparison must be made, it would be like the snow piling on top of the treetop eventually melted by the sunlight and returns to the earth.


It is something that has been decided beforehand.

That’s the reason she has been created, to be that kind of being.


Yet, the girl still wishes.

Wishes for the victory of her beloved.

She believed that is the very proof that she had lived as a human.

profile.CN:
无论逃得多远，
都无法与它彻底分离。

无论如何模仿人的行为举止，
若回头观望，都会发现
它浸没在空无一物的水槽中，悄然袭来。
profile.NA:
No matter how far I run away, I could never separate from it.


No matter how much I act like a person, looking back, submerged within the empty fish tank, it has been creeping up on me.

profile.CN:
利用代代继承下来的特性，
花费漫长时间编织而成的，珠玉的结晶。

即使是其中仅与少女所历年岁相等之物，
甚至都能将大魔术的使用化为可能。

从那凝聚了神秘的宝石中释放出的光辉，
如同她内心的强大一般，
高傲，且美丽。
profile.NA:
They are the crystallization of the jewels that have been woven through a long period of time using special characteristics inherited over many generations.


Particularly, it is possible to perform great magecraft with the ones that are as old as this girl.


The radiance emitted from these jewels formed by mysteries is as noble and beautiful as the strength of the girl’s heart.

profile.CN:
那是正确道路上所不存在的，
空想的可能性。

在烟灰飞舞的大地上插上刀刃的，
是既不会放弃也不会挫败的，
以心化为剑(铁)的正义身姿。
profile.NA:
It’s a possibility of a fantasy that does not exist on the righteous path.


The one who stabbed the blade into the soot filled land is a figure of justice, one with a heart of sword[iron] that can neither be bent nor broken.

profile.CN:
不论何时，我的前方总是漆黑的夜晚。

作为魔术师的才能平平无奇，家世也很平凡。
好不容易找到了能够发挥高御主适性的机会，
一切却在棺中消失于虚空。

有的只是，
认为自己明明应该有所作为的，这份悔恨而已。

即便如此。那个世界的夜晚仍存在着光芒。
虽没有阳光那般炽热耀眼，也不及月光那样柔和优美，
而是宛如夜晚飘落的雪花一般的，微弱的光。

因此，我必须要活下去。
要振作起来。不可以屈服。不论多少次都要站起来。
即便带着数不清的悔恨，也要向前迈进。

因为，在早已不复存在的那个世界中，
我卡多克·泽姆露普斯，
是如同雪花一般消散的她的，
唯一的御主。
profile.NA:
The path I walk has always been in the dark of night.


My talent as a mage is average, my family lineage is also unremarkable, and the opportunity to put my aptitude to be a Master, which was finally discovered, to good use disappeared into the void of the coffin.


The only thing I have is simply the regret that I should have been able to become something.


Even so. There was light within the darkness of my world.

It is not as strong as the sun light, nor as gentle as the moon light, just a faint light, like the snow falling at night.


That’s why I must live.

Pull yourself together. Do not fall down on your knees. Rise, no matter how many times you must.

No matter how numerous regrets you hold, move forward.


Because to the girl who has disappeared like a snow flower in that world that no longer existed, this Kadoc Zemlupus is the only Master.

profile.KR:
대의를 이룬 자들이 그 책무를 어깨에서 내려놓는다.

profile.CN:

profile.CN:
我买了一本素描簿回来。
是喜欢的厂商生产的，新作。
封面的手感非常好。
来，敬请期待。
在干净的白纸上，画出我的灵感吧。
拿起笔——

……啊。
我突然，想到了一件好事。
但是，怎么办才好呢。
心跳开始加速了。

万一，被拒绝了该怎么办？
万一，完成得不够好的话怎么办？
万一……。
不对！
害怕未来这种事，我再也不干了。
一定，一定没问题的。
因为你，就是带给我希望的那个人！

我走出工作室，寻见了你的背影。
优雅地向你搭话，打招呼。
然后我这样说着，发出邀请。

「一起来，创造美丽的舞裙吧？」
profile.NA:
I’ve bought a sketchbook.

It’s a new product that my favourite maker released.

The cover feels really nice to the touch.

Now then, let’s have fun with it.

Let’s draw my inspiration on this beautiful blank paper.

Take a pen in my hand―――


......Ah.

I’ve thought of a really good idea.

But, what should I do?

I’m so nervous.


What if, it gets rejected?

What if, it doesn’t turn out good?

What if......

Non!

I have had enough with being afraid of the future.

I’m sure it’s going to be okay, very sure.

It’s because you are the person who has given me hope!


I exit the atelier and saw you from behind.

I call out to you gracefully and give you my greetings.

And then, I will say this and invite you to join me.


“Shall we create a wonderful dress together?”

profile.CN:
平和而温暖的海风。
以及乘风而来的鸟儿们的啼啭声。
被施以丰饶恩泽的大地，枝叶摇曳的翠绿林木。
被翻卷不息的海浪载着，岸边的雪白浪花优美起舞。

那些曾经在工坊的窗外看到的风景。
全部被凿子温柔的雕刻声所环绕着。

突然，感到了疑惑。

这段记忆中的自己是人类吗？
还是说，是雕像呢？

无论是哪个都好。
毕竟，因为自己的全部幸福就在此处。
总能感觉到自己一直被温暖、安心而又令人满足的某物所笼罩着。

那就是他的爱。
而且——一定还有守护着我们的，美丽女神的目光。

那种感觉到现在也没有忘记。
正因如此，如今光是闭上眼睛便会想起。

在塞浦路斯的记忆，无比美好。
就连此刻，也依然活在自己的心中。
profile.NA:
The gentle and warm sea breeze.

The chirping of the birds riding along those winds to visit.

The land was given abundant blessing, and the green trees' branches and leaves swayed.

Carried by the waves that come and go, the white foam of the beach danced beautifully.


I was always looking at them from the workshop’s window.

Wrapping all around those things was (nothing but) the gentle sound of the chisel.


Suddenly, I started to wonder.


In that memory, was I human? 

Or was I a sculpture?


It didn’t matter which.

Because whichever I was, everything that made me happy was there.

I was always surrounded by something that was warm, relieving, and satisfying.


That thing was his love.

And ―――The beautiful Goddess’ gaze that no doubt was watching over us.


That feeling, even now, still isn’t gone.

That’s why, just by closing my eyes, I could remember it.


My memory of Cyprus is, forever beautiful, and even at this very moment, living within me.
